translations: 关闭（shut 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Mum, Ben keeps shutting me out of the bedroom!
Most governments must simply be shutting their eyes to the problem.
sentences.translation: 大多数政府定会干脆不理会这个问题。

sentences.sentence: She is very reclusive, to the point of shutting me out of her life.
sentences.translation: 她很喜欢独处，到了要把我排斥在她的生活之外的程度。
